summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of GharKaCare app. Verified core functionality including meal planning, language toggle, navigation, localStorage persistence, and UI responsiveness. Most features working correctly with one minor UI overlay issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay blocks bottom navigation clicks intermittently
ui_bugs.workaround: Navigation works with force clicks or direct URL navigation

passed_tests: Home page loads correctly with today's overview
Language toggle switches between English and Hindi successfully
Language preference persists in localStorage (gharkaCare_language)
What to cook today button shows random meal suggestions
Daily Summary modal opens and closes correctly
Meal Planner loads with day tabs (Monday-Sunday)
Meal input fields accept text input correctly
Meal suggestion chips work and add meals when clicked
Day tabs navigation works (tested Saturday active state)
Grocery List page loads and displays correctly
Add grocery item functionality works with input and button
Quick add suggestions for grocery items functional
Reminders page loads with proper form elements
Reminder type selection works (tested gas booking type)
Date picker opens and allows date selection
localStorage persistence verified for all data keys
Bottom navigation elements present and identifiable
Mobile-responsive design works on 390x844 viewport
Toast notifications appear for successful actions
Data structure correctly stored in localStorage with proper keys
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the Emergent badge overlay issue that occasionally blocks bottom navigation clicks. Consider adjusting z-index or positioning to prevent interference with navigation elements.
